subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Budgets and Budgeting
Exercise
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Spelman’s highly unusual move to eliminate the athletic department comes at a time when few institutions seem to be able to resist the lure of intercollegiate sports.
snippet: Spelman’s highly unusual move to eliminate the athletic department comes at a time when few institutions seem to be able to resist the lure of intercollegiate sports.
